tool_description: Validates image quality and extracts metadata from plant/fungi photos to ensure suitability for identification analysis.

image_path.description: File path or URL to the plant/fungi image

error_messages: Image not found: Check that the file path or URL is correct and accessible
Image resolution too low: Capture image with at least the specified minimum resolution
Poor image quality: Ensure good lighting and focus when photographing specimens
Unsupported format: Use JPEG, PNG, or TIFF image formats only
usage: Provide image_path to validate photo quality. Optionally adjust min_resolution and lighting_threshold for stricter validation. Use this before any identification analysis.
